content.question: Do you want to apply to claim your divorce costs?
content.introWhenClaimingAdultery: You can ask the court to order your {{ divorceWho }}, and/or the person with whom the adultery was committed, to pay some or all of the divorce costs.
content.introWhenNotClaimingAdultery: You can ask the court to order your {{ divorceWho }} to pay some or all of the divorce costs.
content.infoAboutFees: This could include all the fees you have to pay during the divorce, such as application fees, solicitors fees, and additional court fees.
content.warning5YearsSeparation: The court does not normally make a costs order where the application is based on 5 years separation.
content.whoCosts: Who do you want to claim the costs from?
content.youHaveToPayFeeNow: The court will make a judgement on who should pay, and how much, at a later stage in the divorce.
content.youHaveToPayFeeAppNow: You'll have to pay your application fee now.

content.question: A ydych am wneud cais i hawlio costau’r ysgariad?
content.introWhenClaimingAdultery: Gallwch ofyn i'r llys orchymyn i’ch {{ divorceWho }} a/neu'r unigolyn y cyflawnodd odineb gydag ef/hi, dalu rhywfaint o gostau’r ysgariad neu holl gostau’r ysgariad.
content.introWhenNotClaimingAdultery: Gallwch ofyn i’r llys orchymyn i’ch {{ divorceWho }} dalu rhywfaint o gostau’r ysgariad neu holl gostau’r ysgariad.
content.infoAboutFees: Gallai hyn gynnwys yr holl ffioedd sy’n rhaid ichi eu talu yn ystod yr ysgariad, megis ffioedd gwneud cais, ffioedd cyfreithiwr, ac unrhyw ffioedd ychwanegol i’r llys.
content.warning5YearsSeparation: Fel rheol ni fydd y llys yn gwneud gorchymyn costau pan fo’r cais yn seiliedig ar fyw ar wahân ers 5 mlynedd.
content.whoCosts: Gan bwy ydych chi am hawlio costau?
content.youHaveToPayFeeNow: Bydd y llys yn dyfarnu pwy ddylai dalu, a faint y dylai dalu, yn nes ymlaen yn ystod yr ysgariad.
content.youHaveToPayFeeAppNow: Mae’n rhaid i chi dalu’r ffi am wneud cais nawr.
